prerequisites: C or better in MATH 1302/ MATH 1402
Subsequent enrollment in MATH 1421/ MATH 1426/ MATH 2425/ MATH 2326/ MATH 3330/ HONR-SC 1426/ HONR-SC 2425 or qualifying ALEKS PPL score
C or better or current enrollment in ENGL 1301 and UNIV 1131

reviews.content: Mixed reviews, advice for most novice coders is to learn the fundamentals and not stretch themselves too thin ie. understand linux etc
Either take it with Donna French or Qudah.

syllabus: This course covers basic programming concepts in C
